author: trawick
msg: Out goes the EBCDIC issue, in goes the error message issue.

author: trawick
msg: Get rid of some outdated character set translation cruft.

author: trawick
msg: EBCDIC support: convert protocol data in getline() and
ap_send_header_field(); change terminate_header() to build the
CRLF in ASCII to begin with.

author: trawick
msg: Introduce ap_xlate_proto_{to|from}_ascii() to clean up some of
the EBCDIC support.  They are noops on ASCII machines, so this
type of translation doesn't have to be surrounded by #ifdef

author: trawick
msg: Get rid of the xlate version of ap_md5_digest()
since we don't compute digests of filtered (e.g., translated)
response bodies this way anymore.  (Note that we don't do it at
all at the present; somebody needs to write a filter to do so.)
